documentation for 「Hello」¶

This is something I want to say that is not in the docstring.

Hello.print_hello_with_name(name)

This function prints hello with a name Args:

name (str): The name to use.

Returns:
int. The return code::

0 – this always return 0

Raises:

AttributeError, KeyError

A really simple function. Really! >>> print_hello_with_name(『foo』) Hello, foo
